tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FishingActivities (
  activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_date DATE NOT NULL,
  fish_species VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  fishing_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  fish_quantity DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  fishing_quota DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE FishingQuota (
    quota_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fish_type VARCHAR(50),
    quota_amount INT,
    valid_from DATE,
    valid_to DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FishingActivity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fisherman_id INT,
    quota_id INT,
    activity_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (fisherman_id) REFERENCES Fisherman(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (quota_id) REFERENCES FishingQuota(quota_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fishing_catches (
   catch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   vessel_id INT,
   catch_date DATE,
   catch_species VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   catch_weight DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (vessel_id) REFERENCES fishing_vessels(vessel_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fishing_logs (
   log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   catch_id INT,
   log_date DATE,
   log_description TEXT,
   FOREIGN KEY (catch_id) REFERENCES fishing_catches(catch_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Fishing_Logs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vessel_id UUID REFERENCES Fishing_Vessels(vessel_id),
  zone_id UUID REFERENCES Fishing_Zones(zone_id),
  fish_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  catch_amount INT NOT NULL,
  log_date DATE
);
